hero.subtitle: A unified ecosystem that automates restaurant management. Move from chaos to system.

items.title: Stop Losing Customers
items.desc: Is your staff slow to respond on Direct? Customers don't wait; they go to competitors. Our bots react instantly to retain your guests.

items.title: Smart Menu Presentation
items.desc: The bot doesn't just say hello. It sends the menu, provides dish information, and guides the guest through their selection.

items.title: Precise Reminders
items.desc: Guests won't forget their reservation. The system automatically sends alerts: 'Your reservation is at 23:00'.

items.title: Automated Reservation
items.desc: From confirmation to cancellationâ€”the entire process is automated. No manual intervention required from your side.

items.title: Zones & Tables
items.desc: Interactive floor plan builder. Manage seating, booking and statuses in real-time.

items.title: Integrations
items.desc: Direct connection with Instagram, WhatsApp and Telegram. Booking where it's convenient.

items.title: Data Protection
items.desc: Your database is completely confidential and secure. We guarantee data safety.

items.title: AI-Assistants
items.desc: Digital employees accepting orders 24/7, reducing staff workload.

items.title: Bell System
items.desc: Instant notifications in the header and PWA push messages. Never miss an event.

items.title: Mobile Control
items.desc: Complete management from your smartphone. Your entire restaurant is in your pocket.
